attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister should allow funding for a UK Space agency (UKSA).
We could set up a new global communications infrastructure or even be part of the 1st human communication from Mars or further a field!

Why should one of the leading countries in the world miss out on something as big and exciting as space ventures?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
